name: Caramel Brownies
ingredients: 14 oz. pkg. Kraft Caramels 9 oz. chocolate chips
1 pkg. German Chocolate cake mix 2/3 cups evaporated milk
1/2 cup butter, melted ½ cups nuts
steps: Melt caramels with 1/3 c. milk over low heat, stirring until smooth. In another bowl combine remaining milk,
cake mix and butter. Mix well. Press ½ of cake mixture into bottom of greased 9 x13 pan.
Bake at 350 for 5 min. Sprinkle 1 cup nuts (optional) and chocolate chips over crust;
top with caramel mixture spreading to the edges of the pan. Top with teaspoonfuls of remaining cake mixture.
Press gently into caramel mixture. Sprinkle with another ½ c. nuts. Bake at 350 for 10-­‐12 minutes.
